description: This recipe is by Bryan Miller And Pierre Franey and takes 1 hour 15 minutes, plus marination time. Tell us what you think of it at The New York Times - Dining - Food.
title: Le Lapin A La Moutarde D'irene (Rabbit Stew With Mustard)
